data.text:
Links to other threads in this project:

bollywhat.boards.net/thread/396 = jodis/kinships in films of 92 Bollywood actors/actresses born 1904-59

bollywhat.boards.net/thread/435 = jodis/kinships in films of 49 Bw actors/actresses born 1959-77

bollywhat.boards.net/thread/393 = jodis/kinships in films of 49 Bw actors/actresses born 1978 or later

bollywhat.boards.net/thread/605 = list of over 600 Indian actors/actresses, in order of birth year.

bollywhat.boards.net/thread/799 = jodis/kinships in films of South Indian Actresses.

I am making a "Jodi Thread" for Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada Actors, and another for Actresses,

to go with the three Jodi Threads for Hindi actors I have there already.

bollywhat.boards.net/thread/503 = Dancelover's personal data

==================================================

Change of Plan 11/30/15: I now see that Mohanlal & Akkineni Nagarjuna must be on Page One,

while Krishnam Raju & Krishna G need not be.

INDEX to men whose lists are in this thread:

Page 1: SUPERSTAR Actors, from MG Ramachandran through Mohanlal.

........ Post #s 1:Index, 2:MGR, 3:Gemini Ganesan, 4:NTR, 5:ANR, 6:Sivaji Ganesan,

7:Rajkumar (K), 8:Prem Nazir (M), 9:Akkineni Nagarjuna, 10:Mohanlal (M),

(move Krishnam Raju, and Krishna G., to later page),

11:Vishnuvardhan (K), 12:Rajinikanth, 13:Mammootty (M), 14:Kamal Hassan, 15:Chiranjeevi.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Page 2: Important older actors.

........ Post #1: C V Nagaiah, 2: CSR Anjaneyulu, 3: M R & M K Radha, 4: Sathyan (M), 5: T S Balaiah,

6: K A Thangavelu & SV Ranga Rao, 7:MN Nambiar & MK Murthy, 8: T L Kanta Rao, 9: Kongara Jaggaiah,

10: SS Rajendran, 11: Gummadi V Rao, 12: T S Nair, 13 T R Ramachandran, 14 K S Nair, 15 T L Kanta Rao.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Page 3 will have Important Lead Actors, of near-Superstar Level, as far as I can tell those levels.

Kaalyan Kumar 1928, R Muthuraman 1929, Uday Kumar March 1933, Madhu Sept 1933, Shobhan Babu 1937,

Jaishankar 1938, Jayan 1939, Krishnam Raju 1940, Krishna G 1943,

Prabhu Ganesan 1956.

later plans not made yet

/ = notes to myself

SOURCES that I use most frequently are Wikipedia,

Internet Movie Database, www.IMDb.com and

Complete Index to World Films www.citwf.com (Alan Goble's website)

Each of them has a page, or several, for each Artist they include, and another page for each film they include.

The cross-referencing is interesting, although not always complete.

I also use other sites, and paper books, as I find them. I should mention Bollywood Humgana,

Chiloka for Kannadan films, and Malayala Chala Chithram for Malalyalam films, and also the

"Blast From The Past" columns in The Hindi, by Randor Guy and others.

Times of India, Filmfare, and Koimoi for modern data.

Who else ought to be included?

Howard "Dancelover" Wilkins

SIVAJI GANESAN Oct 1928 - July 2001 - Padma Shri 1966, Padma Bhushan 1984, Dadasahib Phalke 1996.

aka Viluppuram Chinnaiahpullai Ganesan, aka Vettaithidal Chinnaiah G., aka Shivaji G., aka Nadigar Thilagam (the pride of actors).

Wikipedia says he made 277 Tamil films, 6 in Telugu, 8 others. As of 12/14/18 IMDb counts 324.

Married to Kamala 1952 - 2001. Father of Prabhu Ganesan.

Re-done Nov-Dec 2018 with more data. Awl errors r stil mine.

Codes: \ = part played by 2 actors (usually child\adult); d.r. = dual role; % = guess; %% = guess not in this film. / = notes to myself. & = romantic triangle.

Language codes: H = Hindi, Te = Telugu, M = Malayalam, -? = neither IMDb nor citwf gives language of Mamakaran'63; other sites don't mention it at all.

................ no code = either Tamil, or "I haven't coded it yet."

www.nadigarthilagam.com/Sivajimainc.htm

now (2018) provides an in-order-of-release list of his films (it counts 305 of them) and who else worked on them,

including Directors, Writers, Heroines, and Other Actors.

NOTE that if SG is not the Hero, e.g. in early films or if he Guest Stars, then their listed Heroine works with the Hero,

and SG might have a jodi with another actress. Example: in Paradesi-Te\Poongothai-Ta 1953, Heroine Anjali Devi is paired

with Hero ANR, and Vasantha, who plays their daughter, is SG's jodi.

PREM NAZIR (Abdul Khader) April 1926 - January 1989. Malayalam Films

Padma Bhushan 1983. Said to have appeared in more than 1,700 films.

Leadactor in 725 films; worked opposite Sheela in 130 films, including 107 Jodi-films.

Acted opposite 80+ heroines. (I count 68 of them on 2/21/18.) later a 69th. 72 on 11/12/19.

Released 39 films in 1979 although both IMDb and Wikipedia list only 15 of them.

NOTE: I have not found any of the above claims to be proven. IMDb does count 32 films in 1977 for him.
